name: St. Anthony's Foundation
description: Founded in 1950, St. Anthony’s is the most comprehensive safety net service center in San Francisco. Every day, they provide essential services, health care, and gateways to stability to families and individuals in need. Everyone who comes through their doors joins the St. Anthony’s family and helps us create a future where all people flourish. Services Include: -Dining Room -Free Clothing Program -Medical Clinic -Tech Lab -Hygiene Hub -Addiction Recovery -Transitional Employment -Women's and Ch
